org.jcvlib.core

Class JCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.JCV

  • public class JCV
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains common useful constants and methods.

    • Method Detail

      • getOS

        public static java.lang.String getOS()
        Get constant that identify current operation system.
        Returns:
        Current operation system identifier. See JCV.OS_*.

      • getArch

        public static java.lang.String getArch()
        Get constant that identify current JVM architecture.

        It means, that on 64-bit architecture can be installed 32-bit JVM. In this case 32-bit constant will be returned. It will be correct because we can run only 32-bit native code on 32-bit JCV.

        Returns:
        Current architecture identifier. See JCV.ARCH_*.

      • isLinux

        public static boolean isLinux()
        Check that current operation system is a Linux and running on supported architecture.
        Returns:
        If current operation system is Linux return true and false otherwise.

      • isWindows

        public static boolean isWindows()
        Check that current operation system is a Windows and running on supported architecture.
        Returns:
        If current operation system is Windows return true and false otherwise.

      • equalValues

        public static boolean equalValues(double num1,
                                  double num2)
        Correct compare 2 float-point numbers (with default PRECISION precision). 
         if num1 == num2
      return true
 otherwise
      return false
        Useful for compare values of 2 float-point colors.

      • equalValues

        public static boolean equalValues(double num1,
                                  double num2,
                                  double precision)
        Correct compare 2 float-point numbers with defined precision. 
         if num1 == num2
      return True
 otherwise
      return False
        Useful for compare values of 2 float-point colors.

      • round

        public static int round(double value)
        Round value to nearest integer.

        For example:

        • 1.0 --> 1
        • 1.1 --> 1
        • 1.5 --> 2
        • 1.9 --> 2
        • 2.0 --> 2

      • roundUp

        public static int roundUp(double value)
        Round value to greater integer.

        For example:

        • 1.0 --> 1
        • 1.1 --> 2
        • 1.5 --> 2
        • 1.9 --> 2
        • 2.0 --> 2

      • roundDown

        public static int roundDown(double value)
        Round value to less integer.

        For example:

        • 1.0 --> 1
        • 1.1 --> 1
        • 1.5 --> 1
        • 1.9 --> 1
        • 2.0 --> 2

      • calculateCenter

        public static Point calculateCenter(int width,
                                    int height)
        Return center of element with current image.

        For example if we have size [3 x 2] this method return point (1, 0) (not (1, 1)!). This method round down to odd size and then found a center!

      • verifyIsNotNull

        public static void verifyIsNotNull(java.lang.Object obj)
        Verify if given object is not null and generate IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to verification.

      • verifyIsSameSize

        public static void verifyIsSameSize(Image image1,
                                    Image image2)
        Verify if 2 images have same size and generate IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        image1 - First image.
        image2 - Second image.

      • verifyIsSameChannels

        public static void verifyIsSameChannels(Image image1,
                                        Image image2)
        Verify if 2 images have same number of channels and generate IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        image1 - First image.
        image2 - Second image.

      • verifyNumOfChannels

        public static void verifyNumOfChannels(Image image,
                                       int numOfChannels)
        Verify if image have defined number of channels and generate IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        numOfChannels - Required number of channels.

      • verifyIsSameSize

        public static void verifyIsSameSize(Jama.Matrix mat1,
                                    Jama.Matrix mat2)
        Verify if 2 images have same size and generate IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        mat1 - First matrix.
        mat2 - Second matrix.
